entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 11:21 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: NE 45 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
